page.title: 10The Pulpit at The Minster
page.content: On the sides of the pulpit are carved people.{Mary}and{Jesus}are some of the carved people and there is also a king and a queen and one of the first people who believed in{Jesus.}In the church are some benches called bread pews,they are called bread pews because people used to beg for bread there. The {Normans}built the Minster on top of the original built by the { {Romans.}In between the bread pews there is part of of a{Roman}road and people are allowed to see it. On one side of the pillars there is a faint outline of{Mary}it is called{The {Shadow of Mary.}
